DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Week Attendance
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":6,"WidgetRows":24,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with TimeZone as (
	select 
		c.DefaultTimeZone
	from 
		[User] u left outer join Company c on u.Company = c.Oid
	where
		u.Oid = @CurrentUserId
),
EntryTime as (    
    select 
        ad.Attendance as Id,
		ad.[Time] as InTimeUTC,
        cast(ad.[Time] AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as InTime,
        ad.AdjustedTime as InAdjustedUTC,
		cast(ad.AdjustedTime AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as InAdjusted
    from
        AttendanceDetail ad, TimeZone tz
    where 
        ad.[Type] = 0
),
ExitTime as (
    select 
        ad.Attendance as Id,
        ad.[Time] as OutTimeUTC,
		cast(ad.[Time] AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as OutTime,
        ad.AdjustedTime as OutAdjustedUTC,
		cast(ad.AdjustedTime AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as OutAdjusted
    from
        AttendanceDetail ad, TimeZone tz
    where 
        ad.[Type] = 1
),
Timesheet as (
	select 
		v.UserId, 
		v.[Date],
		sum(v.ActualTime) as Actual
	from 
		Analytics.DatamartTimesheet v
	group by 
		v.UserId,
		v.[Date]
),
Leaves as (
	select 
		v.UserId, 
		v.[Date],
		sum(v.[Hours]) as Leave
	from 
		Analytics.DatamartLeave v
	group by 
		v.UserId,
		v.[Date]
)
select 
	distinct du.Department as DepartmentName,
	du.UserTypologyGroup,
	du.HasImage,
	du.Oid,
	du.FullName as [Name],
	du.ExternalId,
	v.InTimeUTC,
    v.InTime,
	e.OutTimeUTC,
    e.OutTime,
	v.InAdjustedUTC,
    v.InAdjusted,
	e.OutAdjustedUTC,
    e.OutAdjusted,
	IsNull(round(t.Actual,2), 0) as Timesheet,
	IsNull(l.Leave, 0) as Leave,
	a.TardinessTotalMinutes as Tardiness,
	sum(a.TardinessTotalMinutes) over (partition by du.Oid) as TotalTardiness,
	case
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = @FromDate then 'Monday'
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 1, @FromDate) then 'Tuesday'
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 2, @FromDate) then 'Wednesday'
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 3, @FromDate) then 'Thursday'
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 4, @FromDate) then 'Friday'
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 5, @FromDate) then 'Saturday'
		when cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate) then 'Sunday'
	end as WeekDay
from
    EntryTime v
        left outer join ExitTime e on v.Id = e.Id
        left outer join Attendance a on a.Oid = v.Id
		left outer join Analytics.DatamartUser du on du.Oid = a.[User]
		left outer join Timesheet t on (t.UserId = du.Oid and  cast(t.[Date] as date) = cast(v.InTime as date))
		left outer join Leaves l on (l.UserId = du.Oid and cast(l.[Date] as date) = cast(v.InTime as date))
where 
	cast(v.InTime as date) = @FromDate or
	cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 1, @FromDate) or
	cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 2, @FromDate) or
	cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 3, @FromDate) or
	cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 4, @FromDate) or
	cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 5, @FromDate) or
	cast(v.InTime as date) = DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate)
group by 
	du.Department,
	du.UserTypologyGroup,
	du.HasImage,
	du.Oid,
	du.FullName,
	du.ExternalId,
	v.InTimeUTC,
	v.InTime,
	e.OutTimeUTC,
    e.OutTime,
	v.InAdjustedUTC,
    v.InAdjusted,
	e.OutAdjustedUTC,
    e.OutAdjusted,
	t.Actual,
	l.Leave,
	a.TardinessTotalMinutes","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

    "onContentReady": "function bla(e) {\r\n    var queryResult = e.component.getDataSource();        \r\n    if (typeof queryResult === 'undefined') return;        \r\n    if (this.completed) return; 'Leave' + row.WeekDay;\r\n            let tardiness = 'Tardiness' + row.WeekDay;\r\n            let inTimeValue = { [inTime]: row.InTime };\r\n            let outTimeValue = { [outTime]: row.OutTime };\r\n            let inAdjustedValue = { [inAdjusted]: row.InAdjusted };\r\n            let outAdjustedValue = { [outAdjusted]: row.OutAdjusted };\r\n            let timesheetValue = { [timesheet]: row.Timesheet };\r\n            let leaveValue = { [leave]: row.Leave };\r\n            let tardinessValue = { [tardiness]: row.Tardiness };\r\n            if(!objectResult[row.Oid])\r\n                objectResult[row.Oid] = {\r\n                    DepartmentName: row.DepartmentName,\r\n                    UserTypologyGroup: row.UserTypologyGroup,\r\n                    HasImage: row.HasImage,\r\n                    Oid: row.Oid,\r\n                    Name: row.Name,\r\n                    ExternalId: row.ExternalId,\r\n                    TotalTardiness: row.TotalTardiness,\r\n                    [inTime]: row.InTime,\r\n                    [outTime]: row.OutTime,\r\n                    [inAdjusted]: row.InAdjusted,\r\n                    [outAdjusted]: row.OutAdjusted,\r\n                    [timesheet]: row.Timesheet,\r\n                    [leave]: row.Leave,\r\n                    [tardiness]: row.Tardiness\r\n                };\r\n            else {\r\n                objectResult[row.Oid] = {\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.DepartmentName],\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.UserTypologyGroup],\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.HasImage],\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.Oid],\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.Name],\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.ExternalId],\r\n                    ...objectResult[row.TotalTardiness],\r\n                    ...inTimeValue,\r\n                    ...outTimeValue,\r\n                    ...inAdjustedValue,\r\n                    ...outAdjustedValue,\r\n                    ...timesheetValue,\r\n                    ...leaveValue,\r\n                    ...tardinessValue\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        });\r\n        var arrayResult = [];\r\n        Object.values(objectResult).forEach((value) => arrayResult.push(value));\r\n        e.component.instance().beginUpdate();\r\n        e.component.option('dataSource', arrayResult);\r\n        e.component.instance().columnOption(\"DepartmentName\", \"groupIndex\", 0);\r\n        e.component.instance().endUpdate();\r\n        this.completed = true;\r\n        \r\n}",
